scripts.init:front: npm run copy:env && npm run set:env:front
scripts.refresh:env: npm run clean:env && npm run copy:env
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:env && npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:back && npm run clean:front && node rm.js node_modules
scripts.clean:env: node rm.js front/spotifine/src/.env && npm run --prefix ./front/spotifine clear:environment
scripts.clean:back: node rm.js back/dist && node rm.js back/node_modules
scripts.clean:front: node rm.js front/spotifine/www && node rm.js front/spotifine/node_modules
scripts.install:back: npm run install:lib && cd back && npm install
scripts.install:front: npm run install:lib && cd front/spotifine && npm install
